snippet.title: Pirates! Showdown: Enhanced Edition - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Our classic game Pirates! Showdown is being remastered and enhanced with new features!  This trailer shows the Early Access version available on Steam.  Graphics are in the process of being remastered for modern PC's.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2764840/Pirates_Showdown_Enhanced_Edition/
